| HistoryText             = [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Sam Wilson]] met members of the ABCs gang when he was looking for the missing [[Bradley Jenkins (Earth-616)|Bradley Jenkins]]. Sighting the hero, almost all gang members escaped except for a young member who confronted Falcon with a gun wanting to kill an [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avenger]], but Falcon easily disarmed him by having him arrested and getting the answer that Bradley was not a member of the ABCs.{{r|Captain America and the Falcon Vol 2 1}}
